text: Czerwieńczyce () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Nowa Ruda, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately south-east of Nowa Ruda, north of Kłodzko, and south-west of the regional capital Wrocław. ==References== Category:Villages in Kłodzko County
title: Czerwieńczyce
